secrets.name: API_KEY
secrets.label: API Key
secrets.description: API key used to call the risk score service.

configuration.name: API_BASE_URL
configuration.label: API Base URL
configuration.description: Complete (including protocol) base URL for the risk score API.

configuration.name: RISK_SCORE_THRESHOLD
configuration.label: Risk Score Threshold
configuration.description: Block logins with a risk score greater than this value (range is 1 - 10). Set this to 0 to never block logins.
